meanings.definition: Environmentalists or those concerned with protecting the environment.
meanings.sent1: The enviros organized a beach cleanup to protect the ocean.
meanings.sent2: Many enviros advocate for sustainable living practices.
meanings.sent3: The enviros had a picnic in the park to celebrate Earth Day.
meanings.sent4: In the battle for a cleaner planet, the enviros are the frontline soldiers.
meanings.sent5: The enviros planted trees to create a greener community.

meanings.sent1: The storm changed the enviros of the neighborhood drastically.
meanings.sent2: She felt uncomfortable in the unfamiliar enviros of the new city.
meanings.sent3: The enviros at the party were festive and lively.
meanings.sent4: In the quiet enviros of the forest, he found peace and solitude.
meanings.sent5: The enviros of the office were buzzing with excitement for the upcoming project.
